answers.answer: Omg...don't worry. I was 285 when I got pregnant and as the same with you, I don't look it.  I did get diabetes though.  Still there are skinny chicks that get it to.  It has to do with hormones and your placenta, not how much you weigh.  I have only gained 5 lbs at 33 weeks.  So technically I am losing weight.  Just roll with it and try not to think about miscarriages.  They happen for a reason.  I had two before this pregnancy and now I have two angels watching over us.

I'm a very large women. I am 21 weeks now. I have PCOS and one ovary. I got GD. I got tested at 14 weeks. So far I use insulin at bedtime only. Mostly it's diet controlled. No pop or juice. I'm going to make it to at least 36 weeks. So far I have gained 5 pounds then lost two. Your chances are as good as any. One day at a time. You can do this!!! As for the cold get a vaporizer and Vicks!! Hot lemon, honey tea help!

With my first pregnancy I did miscarry.  I  bbc.co overweight and my doc said it was my hormone level to blame not my weight. I went on to get pregnant 6 weeks later. I delivered a healthy baby girl 42 weeks later with absolutely no complications. I am pregnant again and even more overweight than the first two times. Dont worry about it so much. Even if you do miscarry (something I wish on nobody) it doesn't mean you will never be able to have a healthy pregnancy.

question: Hi, I just found out I'm pregnant, about 5 1/2 weeks we guess.  Dr confirmed.  But I'm such a pessimist I'm trying not to be but I'm so worried about miscarriages.   My sister has had 3 abound can't have kids.  I am 25 and never been pregnant.   I about nm overweight.   220 at 5'7 though it is distributed to where most don't guess I weigh that much.  No health problems we know of but I'm worried about nm bout this gestational diabetes thing?  It happens when overweight? And now I have a wicked bad cold and can't take anything.Basically my question is how likely is my chance of going full term overweight?  Am I just being neurotic?
title: just found out
